price: Dájúdájú (ìyà) èyí ni n̄ǹkan tí ẹ̀ ń ṣeyèméjì nípa rẹ̀!
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
